verses.roman:
bahu yatne sei puṅthi nila lekhāiyā
'ananta padmanābha' āilā haraṣita hañā

synonyms: bahu yatne—with great attention; sei puṅthi—that scripture; nila—took; lekhāiyā—having it copied; ananta-padmanābha—to Ananta Padmanābha; āilā—came; haraṣita—in great happiness; hañā—being.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu copied the Brahma-saṁhitā and afterwards, with great pleasure, went to a place known as Ananta Padmanābha.

purport.content: Concerning Ananta Padmanābha, one should refer to Madhya-līlā, Chapter One, text 115.
